0.title: KEY MINER
0.description: A Blockchian based password manager dapp made with the powers of ReactJS and Hardhat to deliver a secure platform for managing passwords.

1.title: CryptoTree
1.description: A crowdfunding decentralized app made using React JS is a platform built on Sepolia blockchain technology that helps collect funds for the plantation of trees and stoping deforestation.

2.title: Sandesha
2.description: This is a blockchain based text messaging app built with React JS, Web3JS, MetamaskAPI, Truffle It allows users to send messages with complete privacy.

3.title: ArtNFT
3.description: An AI based NFT generating and minting dapp made using latest Web3 technologies such as IPFS, web3JS, truffle and many more.
